original_text: I was almost in all evil in the midst of the congregation and assembly.
korean_text: 많은 무리들이 모인 중에서 큰 악에 빠지게 되었노라 하게 될까 염려하노라

sentences.original_text: I was almost in all evil
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 거의 모든 악에 빠져 있었고

sentences.original_text: in the midst of the congregation
